How well do you cope with any change?

answers.label: I can't cope to the extent I can't manage my day-to-day life at all
I can't cope to the extent is causes me a lot of distress
I can cope, but it will make me anxious or worried
I can cope without any difficulties

questions.question: If you are due to meet someone but a few days before they change the date or time, how would you cope with this small, planned change?

answers.label: I can't cope to the extent I can't manage my day-to-day life at all
I can't cope, it would make day-to-day life very difficult to manage
I can't cope. It would make me feel anxious
I can cope without any difficulties
I have a learning difficulty or mental health problem which makes it impossible to cope with any change and would make my day-to-day life unmanageable

questions.question: If you are asked to attend an appointment, but on the day you are contacted to say the time has been changed, how well would you cope with this small unplanned change?

answers.label: I can't cope at all to the extent I would not be able to manage day-to-day life
I can't cope, it would make day-to-day life very difficult to manage
It would make day-to-day life difficult to manage
I can cope without any difficulties
I would not meet anyone in the first place

I can never relate to other people

I will feel anxious or distressed all the time
